permissions: Admin users only (policy requires is_user_admin? for update).
side_effects: Updates the objective stakeholder classification; when interest degree changes, quotes are regenerated asynchronously and the related objective is prompted to update OpenAI files.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one field must be provided; currently only --interest-degree is updatable. --interest-degree must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 1. Objective and stakeholder classification cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --interest-degree
flags.validation: Value must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 1.
